search_term: Find the official pricing page URL for Discourse (discourse.com). Only provide the exact URL to the pricing page, not a summary of pricing information.
response_text: The official pricing page for Discourse is: [https://discourse.org/buy/](https://discourse.org/buy/) .

extracted_content.content:
_Change plans anytime. All prices in USD._

#### Starter

$20 per month

A great place to start a community

#### Standard

$100 per month

Connect with your community and grow together

#### Business

$500 per month

Scale your business and help your customers and users connect with each other

#### Enterprise

Our most customizable and scalable plan, tailored to your needs and brand

Discourse is 100% free, open source forum software. Forever. [Install from GitHub](https://github.com/discourse/discourse).

[Compare plans and features](https://discourse.org/buy/#plans-features)

### Compare plans & features

Frequently asked questions
--------------------------

Can’t find the answer you’re looking for? [Get in touch with us](https://www.discourse.org/contact).

Are there educational or non-profit discounts?Yes! If you are legally recognized as an educational institution we offer an 85% discount. If you are legally recognized as a non-profit organization that is exempt from federal taxes, we offer a 50% discount. These discounts apply only to our Standard and Business plans, cannot be combined with other discounts, and must be paid through a debit/credit card monthly or annually. [Please contact us](https://www.discourse.org/contact) after starting your trial and we’ll add the discount to your account.

What if none of these plans fit my budget?Good news! Discourse is, and will always be, [100% free and open source](https://github.com/discourse/discourse) software. You may also want to self-host for reasons other than budget, including privacy or full control over the free software that you’ve installed. [Here’s how you can install it yourself](https://blog.discourse.org/2014/04/install-discourse-in-under-30-minutes/) on your own server.

Alternatively, the community can install or host Discourse in the cloud for you. [Check out our list of trusted partners you can work with.](https://www.discourse.org/partners)

Can I switch plans?Change plans any time for any reason. To upgrade instantly, visit your admin dashboard. To downgrade your plan, [please contact us](https://www.discourse.org/contact) and we’ll make it happen.

Can I transition from self-install to hosted, or vice-versa?Yes. Migrating from Discourse to Discourse using a backup is easy, and we’ll take care of everything if you are moving to our hosting.

What happens if I go over the plan limits?Your site will never stop working! If limits are exceeded for an extended period of time, we will get in touch with you to discuss flexible upgrade options.

And, by the way, you can upgrade your plan at any time with a few clicks on your admin dashboard.

Can I switch to a different host?Your data always belongs to you. Back up all your Discourse data right from your web browser, any time. Migrate to or from any cloud provider with ease.

Who are your customers?We might be a little biased, but we think they’re some of the finest companies and organizations in the world. [Browse our customer list.](https://www.discourse.org/customers)

Official Discourse hosting plans for communities of every size.

pricing_data.pricing_notes: Discourse offers a free open-source version alongside subscription-based hosting plans.
